storyInfo:
Ifrit and Projekt Red have another dispute over homework, resulting in Ifrit losing control of her emotions - and nearly her powers as well.
But with the help of those around her, she finally manages to regain control over herself.

attributes.content: Everything was white.
From the sky above my head to the ground beneath my feet, everything I could see was a calming white.
Pure, silent, empty white.
Only the flames flickered and swayed.
Eventually, my dream quietly eroded, melting away until finally I awakened.
'Where am I?'
No answer.
'Why am I here?'
No answer.
'Should I leave?'
No answer.
There was no one but me.
There was nothing but me.
And so,
My confusion left only one——
'What... are you?'
02:35 P.M. \ Rainy and Overcast
Rhodes Island Ark - Cabin #2 - Operator Quarters
...Phew.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Again. Why is it always that same dream. What the hell does it mean?)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Ugh. I slept on my head wrong. It's throbbing.)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Scratching) This is all this damned Doctor's fault. These questions are too hard!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What is this even about? Surface area? Who cares?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Aaaaaagh!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Nonononono! Not now! Don't ignite!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Eeeeep...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I singed the edge of the desk... Okay, at least I didn't burn the worksheet.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: This Doctor...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ugh, do I really have to do this whole thing? Pain in the ass...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Huh? Studying is good for me?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Come on. Like I didn't know that. Why else would anybody study with you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But this is too much homework! And like, what's the difference between this word and this word?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I say two words to you and Silence takes away my dried peppers. It's all your fault!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, what are you laughing at?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: I know where she's hiding the dried peppers.;......;Chargrilled sandworm leg. Want one?

attributes.content: Really?! Where?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I want to take them with you. Then she'll lecture both of us.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Stop silently smiling like that, it's really creepy!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You just don't want to answer me?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ew, Doctor, what is that?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No, no! I don't want it! ——mmm?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Chewing) Mm.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Swallowing) Gulp... ah?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Wh- what did I just eat?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Never mind...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, is Silence going out on a mission tomorrow?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You think I could go too? You know how powerful I am, don't you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Just talk to her for me. See if you can get her to let me go.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: This is a cleanup operation. You're better at combat, aren't you?;We've had quite a few complaints this month. You sit tight for a bit.

attributes.content: What are you talking about? I can handle that stuff.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: So why aren't we fighting right now? Send me out already. I want to show everyone my power!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I can glass a whole battlefield with my flames. They're just jealous they can't!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I don't care what they say!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You and Silence believe in me, don't you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: The others don't understand. I don't care about them, and they don't care about me.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But why! Tell me why!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I hate you.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Forget it. Screw you. Here. This one, and this one, all of these... they're all C.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: And this one... I don't really get. Doesn't matter. It's C too.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: There. Done...!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's time for your checkup, Ifrit.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Another annoying doctor's here.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Why do I smell burning...?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ifrit? Work with me.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: We're checking the density of Originium crystals in your blood today. Are you going to cooperate... Hm? What happened to the desk here? How did it get charred?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. It was an accident.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit... you know this is dangerous.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: You can't be starting fires inside Rhodes Island. You have to control yourself.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I told them we can't use any suppression drugs, but you have to work with us...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Are you finished? You sure love to hear yourself talk!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Ifrit, I'm a nurse. I'm really not good with kids.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: So do you think we could just, you know, communicate?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Who's a kid?! Do you ever, like, think?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Why do I have to deal with people like you all day?! Why can't everyone just leave me alone?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit... I'm just doing my job.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Then do it somewhere else! I feel sick to my stomach whenever I see those dumbasses in their stupid white coats!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Out of my way. I'm leaving.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But, your checkup...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'll make you move!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Aaah!!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: My- my homework! It- it burned!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What did you do?! You did this!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit! Hurry! The flames!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I told you to leave me alone!!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You have to pay for this!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: W- wait! I'll get Nightingale. Just hold on!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: ...Why.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What did I do this time? Damn it...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: My homework!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's... ruined.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Silence won't take me either. Even though I'm this powerful!)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (The Doctor's gone too. It's just me and those sickos in the white coats...)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (It sucks. They're so scared of me they run off as far as they can.)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (My notebook... is a little singed, but it's still good.)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Whatever. I'll just put the practice questions on the Doctor's desk. Good to go, right?)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Can I help you?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: You'll scare people acting like that.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I'm just walking.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Normal people don't walk on the walls.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Forget it.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: What's that in your hand there...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Homework.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: It's a pain. But Kal'tsit said to listen to the Doctor. I had no choice.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You understand this? This word, I do not know.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You're... you're asking me.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: You don't know?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I can try. Let me see.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: This word... Hm... I'm not sure either.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: ...I think it's like this.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Do you understand now? I'm afraid I didn't speak clearly.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Yes. Very clear.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I'm glad.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: But you could have asked the Doctor too. The Doctor would have explained it better than me.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Yes. But I think Frostleaf speaks softly.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: What are you two doing hanging out in the hallway!
Hey, Little Red Riding Hood, right? How come I never see you in class...?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ——Ifrit.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Ifrit, don't get so close to her.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Red has very quick defensive reflexes. She might lash out at you accidentally.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Defensive reflexes?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: What happens to things that get within five centimeters of you?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I cut them.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: See.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Huh... You seem to know a lot about her, Ice Cube.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I've gone over the operator's handbook and spoken to Dobermann.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: But do you think maybe you could relax a bit around us, Red?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Never mind...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Pff.. hahaha!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What's funny?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Hah?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, Red.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hmm...? What's that you're hiding behind your back?
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Oh? This? It's- it's my homework.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: The mighty Ifrit conquered it easily.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh...? I'm glad.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: I smell burning.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Ifrit burned her homework.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I didn't do it on purpose.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...You think I burned my homework so I didn't have to finish it, don't you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Just come out and say it already.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't, Ifrit. She doesn't talk much...
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Are you mad?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I hate you! You're the worst. Why do we have to be in the same class?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Why does today suuuck so muuch...? Why does this keep happening to meee?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Calm down, Ifrit.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: The temperature is rising. This is getting dangerous.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: ...huh?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't act like you know me. I'm fine! Don't talk to me like you know everything!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: A threat?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: No, Red, it's okay! That's just how she is!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Monster.
Gah.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: What do you get...?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Monster.
A monster that hurts people. A monster that burns things. A monster who can't control herself.
It... It hurts... Agh...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Monster.
Need to burn?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Wait, Ifrit... not here.
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Mind your own business!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Monster.
You don't know me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Monster.
Stop!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: She's a threat to me. A threat to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Don't do it, Red! She's just heating up!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Both of you——
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Who's heating up? Are you calling me a hothead?! I'm thinking clearly! It's you and your whole ice queen thing nobody wants! Get the hell away from me or I'll turn you to cinders!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No. Don't.
She's out of control. So weak.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You're kindling, Hood!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Monster.
No, don't do it. They're friends.
Don't! Ifrit!
attributes.name: Frostleaf

attributes.content: Monster!
I'm not! I'm not a monster!
The flames ignite.
The flames are out of control.
The giant monster cackles.
The white room burns to a charred black.
Some cry. Some flee.
Where am I?
Someone is coming. Someone familiar. Tall...
No...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Sari... save... them...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh dear, oh my, what is going on here?
Iffy? You can't be igniting in the corridors. Saria would be very upset if she knew. Silence too.
Get...!
No, it's not... you're not...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Let's gather up some water molecules and calm those flames down...
Pfah——It's freezing cold!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Wha... MuMu?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: MuMu, help me... I don't want to...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Shhh——You can't tell anyone I'm here.
It's okay. I'll take care of it.
Hehe, I'm not worried at all. You're going to be fine.
But remember what we agreed, Iffy?
Cruel.
Wanton.
Rampage.
Destroyed everything.
I know it's all true.
The painful experiments make me sick.
The stares of the people in the white coats make me sick.
This place makes me sick.
This is no life.
This is no future.
All it would take is one flame, one lick hot enough, and all their disgusting eyes, all those white walls stinking of disinfectant, all of it would go up in smoke.
As long as the people I like survive.
The rest mean nothing.
——That's how I used to think. Before I came here.
I think that's how I always thought.
But I'm different now.
Cruel.
I know I know.
Wanton.
Okay, fine, I'll be careful.
Rampage.
...it really wasn't that bad!
Destroyed everything.
I didn't mean to!
It's not like I don't know.
But at least, hrm...
Like you said. I can do it.
I won't burn Rhodes Island, or my homework.
Or my friends. Hrmm... my friends are all as great as me anyway!
So, it's fine. I get it. I haven't been trying hard enough. I have to try even harder.
Just watch me. I'll show all of you!
Hmph!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: A whole corridor destroyed, just like that?;Chargrilled sandworm leg. Want one?

attributes.content: N- no! Agh! It's none of your business!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Grr... That Little Red Riding hood and, everyone else, they're okay...?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You helped Hood get away? Hmph, good.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm dangerous? Everyone's dangerous? Oh...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Let me have one... N- no! I don't want to eat it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I can't... eat that much.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: That whole, thing, back in the hallway, I didn't do it on purpose... So, I guess, I'm- I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Gross, why are you looking at me like that...?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh, hey, don't you need to check my homework? Here it is!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: This notebook looks a little scorched.;......

attributes.content: Gah, don't take it if you don't like it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You can make it out, can't you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Here. This is the homework.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: There was a little accident and it got like this... Hey, what's with that look? Just come out and say it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It is what it is! Who cares if you don't believe me. I did the whole thing. I really did!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's- it just got a little... ripped... and singed... and splashed.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: And um erm, some of them I just kind of guessed, but... I'll do better next time!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I screwed up again.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Just lay into me already. I can take it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Huh? Why?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ow! Not so rough!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's my... dried peppers? My favorite dried peppers!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You, uh? I can have them?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey... what the hell! You prick! Don't think you can just give me a little snack and then... and then...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Sniffle)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hah. Fine then. But I still think you white coat dumbasses are hella gross!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Whisper) But I guess you can be an exception!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But I'm warning you! Don't treat me like a kid all time, like Silence does!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'll get angry! And you wouldn't like me when I'm angry!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: You are an exemplary operator.;Truly imposing, Iffy.

attributes.content: Gr... Grr... where did that come from all of a sudden?! It's obvious anyway!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Gah——Cough cough cough.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: And who taught you that nickname anyw—— No, who—— who said you could call me that!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: You'll be joining the next operation.

attributes.content: Really? Really really?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You mean it? I can go out on the next mission? You really mean it? No kidding?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But what?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Open your damned mouth!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You want me to think it through myself? What's that supposed to mean...?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Right. I have to go apologize...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: The medic lady, I didn't mean to scare her... And I shouldn't have been so rough with Frostleaf and Hood...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, can you do me a favor? Can you come with me? To apologize?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: Why not go yourself?;Are you going to scare more medics?

attributes.content: I know I screwed up.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But they're really the worst! Still... I shouldn't do that to them...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: And I don't want people blaming you for it either.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: Next time we go to the beach, would you like to join us?

attributes.content: Beach? What's that?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. I'll go! I wanna go!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Erm, but, why did you invite me all of a sudden? You're kind of a weirdo, Doctor...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: Because if you behave yourself, I think I could convince Silence to let you go.

attributes.content: Ugh. You're always trying to make me do stuff, huh?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hmph. Fine! I can do it! I can apologize!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: So we have a deal? No backsies! You have to let me go!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hehe. 'Beach!' Yeah, sounds pretty sweet.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: See you tomorrow, Doctor!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Are you still looking?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yeah. I know how they look at me. I know what they think of me.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But it doesn't bother me. What do I care?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'll melt you!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You know, it's your fault for embarrassing me. That's why I always end up in trouble.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Where would you be without me?
Hah. You think I'm still afraid of you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: As much as you hurt me, as much as you hurt everyone...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Fatass! Moron! Pig! Blimp with horns!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Haha. Good one.
Look, I'm never going to burn everything again.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I get it. Some things I can burn. Some things I can't.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: There's nothing that can't be burned!
What? It's my choice!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: If the mighty Ifrit chooses not to burn something, it cannot be burned!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: And whatever gets in my way, I'll burn to the ground.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But the stuff I can't burn? I won't touch. Not with a single lick!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Then I wait, little thing.
Sooner or later, that day... will come!
attributes.name: Ifrit
